sentences.sContent: The  sugared  vinegar is  refined from the sugarcane and  pine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.sCn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的.

sentences.sContent: To make the red-wine vinaigrette, whisk together the oil, vinegar and mustard in a medium bowl until well combined.
sentences.sContent_eng: To make the red-wine vinaigrette, whisk together the oil, vinegar and mustard in a medium bowl until well combined.
sentences.sCn: 制作红酒醋油沙司，将油、醋和芥末放在一个中等大小的碗里一起搅拌，直到混合均匀。

sentences.sContent: In cooking, vinegar can be used alone or to add flavor without calories to our food, but what will it do if we use it on our hair?
sentences.sContent_eng: In cooking, vinegar can be used alone or to add flavor without calories to our food, but what will it do if we use it on our hair?
sentences.sCn: 在烹饪中，醋可以单独食用，也可以用作食物调味料不附加任何卡路里，但如果我们把它涂抹到头发上呢？

words.tran: 不愉快的；尖酸的；乖戾的；有醋味的

trans.tranOther: a sour-tasting liquid made from malt or wine that is used to improve the taste of food or to preserve it
